General.Name: COSCO SHIPPING International (Singapore) Co. Ltd
General.Description: COSCO SHIPPING International (Singapore) Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, provides integrated logistics services in South and Southeast Asia. It operates through Logistics, Dry Bulk Shipping, Ship Repair and Marine Engineering, and Property Management. The company provides warehousing solution and value added services; container depot; automotive logistics; and trucking services, police escort, port clearance, freight coordination, and dry hubbing services. It also offers property management services; and dry bulk cargo transportation services comprising grains, iron ore, coal, steel, cement, and fertilizers through 3 vessels, as well as ship repair and marine engineering services. In addition, the company provides storage and warehouse and container station and depot services; maintenance and repair of equipment and freight transport agency services; and engages in the ship owning and chartering activities. Further, it offers logistic service, freight forwarding, and container depot services. The company was formerly known as COSCO Corporation (Singapore) Limited and changed its name to COSCO SHIPPING International (Singapore) Co., Ltd. in April 2017. The company was incorporated in 1961 and is based in Singapore. COSCO SHIPPING International (Singapore) Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Ocean Shipping Company Limited.
